implementation.functions:
--local RulesEngine
function RulesEngine_startup (lul_device) luup.log("RulesEngine startup") RulesEngine = require("L_RulesEngine1") if (RulesEngine ~= nil) then return RulesEngine.startup(lul_device) else return false, "Can't load library" end end

action.name: SetTarget
action.job: if (RulesEngine ~= nil) then if ((lul_settings.newTargetValue == "1") and not RulesEngine.isStarted()) then RulesEngine.start() elseif ((lul_settings.newTargetValue == "0") and RulesEngine.isStarted()) then RulesEngine.stop() end end return 4, nil

action.name: LoadRules
action.job: if (RulesEngine ~= nil) then RulesEngine.RulesFile.load(lul_settings.fileName, false, lul_settings.ruleIdx) end return 4, nil

action.name: RemoveRule
action.job: if (RulesEngine ~= nil) then RulesEngine.Rules.remove(lul_settings.fileName, lul_settings.ruleIdx, lul_settings.ruleId) end return 4, nil

action.name: SetRuleArming
action.job: if (RulesEngine ~= nil) then RulesEngine.Rule.setArming(lul_settings.ruleId, lul_settings.arming) end return 4, nil

action.name: SetRuleAcknowledgement
action.job: if (RulesEngine ~= nil) then RulesEngine.Rule.setAcknowledgement(lul_settings.ruleId, lul_settings.acknowledgement) end return 4, nil
